name: Feathers
description:
A young harpy who has many friends... all of whom love their feathers. Maybe a bit too much.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare #40, where the theme was "the more you have, the worse it is". For this entry, you can consider the theme as in the main character has too many friends or simply too many feathers. I made this in about 5 hours on Monday after some, ah, technical difficulties aka I dropped out of Ludum Dare on Saturday but here's my entry! I hope you guys enjoy this rather short story.

This was made in 5 hours on Twine 2. The background image is from Unsplash. The writing and development is by me, Mikomi Kisomi.
